content: X-EKSC MX Pipe clamp Plastic cable/conduit clamp with clip-in design and snap-lock for use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling Closing latch for additional security Silicone-free and halogen-free material Virtually dust-free fastening Quick, cost-efficient fastening Applications Fastening cable conduits For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduits Material: Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant according to EN 60695-2-11 at 650°C, Flame-retardant according to IEC 60695-2-11 at 650°C, Flame-retardant according to VDE 0471 part 2-11 at 650°C, UV-resistant (fair) For use with (tools): BX 3-ME-22, BX 3-ME-A22, DX 351 MX, DX 460 MX, DX 5 MX, GX 120-ME, GX 3-ME Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening | Material | Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant, UV-resistant (fair) | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | CSTB, ETA, UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 274083 - Electr. cable clamp X-EKSC 16 MX - Package Size 100 pc - 274087 - Electr. cable clamp X-EKSC 25 MX - Package Size 100 pc
